answers.answer: Hi!Very small blood vessels in the brain get blocked and this results in loss of oxygen supply to minute areas of the brain. This is called micro-ischemia. Thisappears as small white dots on MRI. It can be caused by diabetes, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, advanced age, and autoimmune diseases. Hope this helps.
